organizing median. 

```{r}

medianFX <- function(.df, .ID, .measure){
  
  ID <- enquo(.ID)
  measure <- enquo(.measure)
  
  df <- .df %>%
    select(!!ID, !!measure) %>%
    mutate(!!measure := round(!!measure*100,2)) %>%
    spread(!!ID, !!measure)
  
  return(df)
  
}

RR_MED <- medianFX(RR_100_both, population, RR_median)
STICK_MED <- medianFX(STICK_100_both, population, stickiness_median)
TAT_MED <- medianFX(TAT_100_both, population, TAT_median)

#first passage (differs, so hard coded)
FPTT_MED <- FPTT_100_both %>%
  select(population, FPTT_median) %>%
  spread(population, FPTT_median)

#rbinding 
OutMed <- rbind(TAT_MED,
                STICK_MED,
                FPTT_MED,
                RR_MED) #time at true > 50 %

#new rownames 
rownames(OutMed) <- a$name

```

Kable

```{r}

#creating the relevant groups 
MedIQR <- cbind(OutMed, OutIQR)
MedIQR <- add_column(MedIQR, " " = "", .after = 5)

#now we have to rename columns 
MedIQR <- MedIQR %>%
  rename(All = "All.1",
         Bo = "Bo.1",
         Mave = "Mave.1",
         Tess = "Tess.1",
         Rey = "Rey.1")

#kable - median & IQR
AlteredABM <- MedIQR %>%
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", 
                                      #"hover", 
                                      #"condensed", 
                                      "responsive")) %>%
  add_header_above(c("", "Median" = 5, " " = 1, "IQR" = 5)) %>%
  add_header_above(c("B", "Altered ABM" = 11)) #%>%
  #add_indent(c(2, 5)) 


Devezer
```
